Posts.Content: May 27, 2009 01:05AM jodiphyllodesinva wrote: I too, like tampaphyllodes14 just got a diagnosis of low-grade phyllodes tumor...mine in left breat about 2 cm.  Had a lumpectomy...but need to go back in for margins that were not taken during first surgery.  I have an appointment with an oncologist before having the surgeon go back in.  Also scheduled for an MRI before next surgery.  Any other advice?
